bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: List of persons who received copies of Conquerors of Yellow Fever, [19--]

div1.p: This list records names and addresses of persons in the United States and Cuba who received copies of "Conquerors of Yellow Fever."

div1.head: List of persons who received copies of Conquerors of Yellow Fever, [19--]
